plot: A ghost who knows of a hidden munitions dump with unexploded bombs confides in Melinda that one of those bombs is missing and in the wrong hands, warning that someone will lose their life.

Connection to a war surplus dealer has Melinda's shop decked out in military items for sale, but it also starts a series of nightmares where Melinda sets off a landmine. Investigation brings to light the dealer scavenging an abandoned military base, where an interest in bombs brings about the death of a youngster. Meanwhile, President Bedford witnesses Eli's and Ned's system for hiding the Book of Changes and makes a play for it on the behalf of the shadows, taking a viable bomb from the abandoned base. As the boy makes Melinda and Eli aware of Pres. Bedford's actions, Eli loses his police contact, and Pres. Bedford makes his move for the book.—statmanjeff
